import random

def row_strategy(history):
    if len(history) == 0:
        return 0
    
    # Simple baseline: always pick 0 to maximize payoff when both choose 0 (2,1)
    # Since we prefer strategy 0 and the opponent copies our last move with 80% chance,
    # we want to keep them from switching to 1 when we are in 0.
    # If we always play 0, they will copy 0 with 80% chance → we get (2,1) 80% of the time.
    # If they switch to 1 (20% chance), we get (0,0) — but this is rare.
    # This is simpler and more predictable than adaptive strategies.
    
    return 0
ENDOFFILE
